remarks: Range of the map defined by ~ df-mapd .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mapdrn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdrn.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdrn.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdrn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdrn.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
mapdrn.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
mapdrn.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
mapdrn.t $e |- T = ( LSubSp ` D ) $.
mapdrn.c $e |- C = { g e. F | ( O ` ( O ` ( L ` g ) ) ) = ( L ` g ) } $.
mapdrn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdrn $p |- ( ph -> ran M = ( T i^i ~P C ) ) $.
$d F g $.
$d K g $.
$d L g $.
$d O g $.
$d U g $.
$d W g $.
